ygData.subject: Re: Paw of Opolla
ygData.msgSnippet: You get the paw off Vin Moltar if I remember right. I guess we need to be looking for more Moltars for the rest of the rings. Could you talk to Gynok? The Paw
ygData.messageBody:
You get the paw off Vin Moltar if I remember right. I guess we need to be
looking for more Moltars for the rest of the rings. Could you talk to Gynok?
The Paw quest seems pretty complex, so hopefully there is a good payoff.

> I have managed to get 2 pieces  the paw and 1 ring ( identified with
> spell as a Ring of Opolla) the paw is a four slot container so I was
wondering
> if anybody knew of  any Magic rings Lore items Like the Platinum ring
> off Gynok Moltar in befallen ( crap stats) .. They may be what i need I'm
> currently looking in Erudin and Kerra isle for some .. but haven't found
> any yet ...
